metadata.synopsis: A one-liner dialog for a female human dancer performing on the stage in Sharess Caress'.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Sharess Caress', taproom, stage room

0.speaker: Queen Rhol, the Despoiler
0.text: We can dance if you want to.

1.speaker: Queen Rhol, the Despoiler
1.text: You can stare as much as you like.
